<a id="class_EditorFileDialog"></a>

# EditorFileDialog

**Inherits:** [ConfirmationDialog](class_confirmationdialog.md) **<** [AcceptDialog](class_acceptdialog.md) **<** [Window](class_window.md) **<** [Viewport](class_viewport.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A modified version of [FileDialog](class_filedialog.md) used by the editor.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**EditorFileDialog** is an enhanced version of [FileDialog](class_filedialog.md) available only to editor plugins. Additional features include list of favorited/recent files and the ability to see files as thumbnails grid instead of list.

Unlike [FileDialog](class_filedialog.md), **EditorFileDialog** does not have a property for using native dialogs. Instead, native dialogs can be enabled globally via the [EditorSettings.interface/editor/use_native_file_dialogs](class_editorsettings.md#class_EditorSettings_property_interface/editor/use_native_file_dialogs) editor setting. They are also enabled automatically when running in sandbox (e.g. on macOS).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

The **EditorFileDialog** can select only one file. Accepting the window will open the file.<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_OPEN_FILES"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FileMode](class_editorfiledialog.md#enum_EditorFileDialog_FileMode) **FILE_MODE_OPEN_DIR** = `2`

The **EditorFileDialog** can select only one directory. Accepting the window will open the directory.<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_OPEN_ANY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FileMode](class_editorfiledialog.md#enum_EditorFileDialog_FileMode) **FILE_MODE_OPEN_ANY** = `3`

The **EditorFileDialog** can select a file or directory. Accepting the window will open it.<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_SAVE_FILE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FileMode](class_editorfiledialog.md#enum_EditorFileDialog_FileMode) **FILE_MODE_SAVE_FILE** = `4`

The **EditorFileDialog** can select only one file. Accepting the window will save the file.<hr class="classref-item-separator">

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_property_access"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

The location from which the user may select a file, including ``res://``, ``user://``, and the local file system.

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_overwrite_warning_disabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the **EditorFileDialog** will not warn the user before overwriting files.

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_property_file_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_file_mode**\ (\ value\: [FileMode](class_editorfiledialog.md#enum_EditorFileDialog_FileMode)\ )
- [FileMode](class_editorfiledialog.md#enum_EditorFileDialog_FileMode) **get_file_mode**\ (\ )

The dialog's open or save mode, which affects the selection behavior.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_property_filters"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **filters** = `PackedStringArray()` [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_property_filters)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_filters**\ (\ value\: [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md)\ )
- [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **get_filters**\ (\ )

The available file type filters. For example, this shows only ``.png`` and ``.gd`` files: ``set_filters(PackedStringArray(["*.png ; PNG Images","*.gd ; GDScript Files"]))``. Multiple file types can also be specified in a single filter. ``"*.png, *.jpg, *.jpeg ; Supported Images"`` will show both PNG and JPEG files when selected.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_property_option_count"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **option_count** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_property_option_count)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_option_count**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_option_count**\ (\ )

The number of additional [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md)\ s and [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md)\ es in the dialog.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_property_show_hidden_files"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **show_hidden_files** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_property_show_hidden_files)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_show_hidden_files**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_showing_hidden_files**\ (\ )

If ``true``, hidden files and directories will be visible in the **EditorFileDialog**. This property is synchronized with [EditorSettings.filesystem/file_dialog/show_hidden_files](class_editorsettings.md#class_EditorSettings_property_filesystem/file_dialog/show_hidden_files).

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_add_filter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_filter**\ (\ filter\: [String](class_string.md), description\: [String](class_string.md) = ""\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_add_filter)

Adds a comma-separated file name `filter` option to the **EditorFileDialog** with an optional `description`, which restricts what files can be picked.

A `filter` should be of the form ``"filename.extension"``, where filename and extension can be ``*`` to match any string. Filters starting with ``.`` (i.e. empty filenames) are not allowed.

For example, a `filter` of ``"*.tscn, *.scn"`` and a `description` of ``"Scenes"`` results in filter text "Scenes (\*.tscn, \*.scn)".

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_add_option"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_option**\ (\ name\: [String](class_string.md), values\: [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md), default_value_index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_add_option)

Adds an additional [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) to the file dialog. If `values` is empty, a [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md) is added instead.

\ `default_value_index` should be an index of the value in the `values`. If `values` is empty it should be either ``1`` (checked), or ``0`` (unchecked).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_add_side_menu"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_side_menu**\ (\ menu\: [Control](class_control.md), title\: [String](class_string.md) = ""\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_add_side_menu)

Adds the given `menu` to the side of the file dialog with the given `title` text on top. Only one side menu is allowed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_clear_filename_filter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_filename_filter**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_clear_filename_filter)

Clear the filter for file names.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_clear_filters"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_filters**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_clear_filters)

Removes all filters except for "All Files (\*.\*)".

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_filename_filter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](class_string.md) **get_filename_filter**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_filename_filter)

Returns the value of the filter for file names.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_line_edit"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[LineEdit](class_lineedit.md) **get_line_edit**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_line_edit)

Returns the LineEdit for the selected file.

\ **Warning:** This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [CanvasItem.visible](class_canvasitem.md#class_CanvasItem_property_visible) property.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_option_default"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_option_default**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_option_default)

Returns the default value index of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) or [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md) with index `option`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_option_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](class_string.md) **get_option_name**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_option_name)

Returns the name of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) or [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md) with index `option`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_option_values"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **get_option_values**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_option_values)

Returns an array of values of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) with index `option`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_selected_options"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **get_selected_options**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_selected_options)

Returns a [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) with the selected values of the additional [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md)\ s and/or [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md)\ es. [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) keys are names and values are selected value indices.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_vbox"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[VBoxContainer](class_vboxcontainer.md) **get_vbox**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_get_vbox)

Returns the [VBoxContainer](class_vboxcontainer.md) used to display the file system.

\ **Warning:** This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [CanvasItem.visible](class_canvasitem.md#class_CanvasItem_property_visible) property.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_invalidate"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **invalidate**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_invalidate)

Notify the **EditorFileDialog** that its view of the data is no longer accurate. Updates the view contents on next view update.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_popup_file_dialog"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **popup_file_dialog**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_popup_file_dialog)

Shows the **EditorFileDialog** at the default size and position for file dialogs in the editor, and selects the file name if there is a current file.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_set_filename_filter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_set_option_default"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_option_default**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md), default_value_index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_set_option_default)

Sets the default value index of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) or [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md) with index `option`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_set_option_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_option_name**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md), name\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_set_option_name)

Sets the name of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) or [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md) with index `option`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorFileDialog_method_set_option_values"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_option_values**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md), values\: [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorFileDialog_method_set_option_values)

Sets the option values of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) with index `option`.
